name: Rhino Riding Simulator
description:
Riding a Rhino is in itself is a challenge and riding it on challenging tracks to complete challenging missions is real challenging.Ride this 1500 kg beast under various (and increasingly difficult) circumstances.

If you are a enthusiast or have ever wondered how they manage these huge monsters, try this game!

* Addictive as hell, start easy and progress
* Awesome 3D graphics and amazing gameplay
* Easy to control -
Enjoy this realistic experience
